Battleships

"Battleships!" is a game played by two players taking turns. On a player's turn, the player must select a target in the enemy field and fire. If it has hit something, an explosion icon will be displayed at the point. If it has not hit anything, a water droplet icon will be displayed at the point. The player that survives, by having at least one boat still not sunk, wins the game.

Ship Placement

Human VS. Computer
